description: This file defines a plugin named 'storePlugin' for a Lightning JS application, implementing a global store for managing cart items, UI flags, and order tracking within a food delivery frontend.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Adds an item to the cart, increasing quantity if item already exists.

methods.name: removeFromCart
methods.description: Removes an item from the cart by its ID.

methods.name: updateQty
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific item in the cart, with a minimum of 1.

methods.name: clearCart
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.

methods.name: toggleCart
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the cart UI.

methods.name: openTracking
methods.description: Opens order tracking UI for a specific order ID.
